/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++17 -m64 -pipe -fsigned-char -fno-common -Qunused-arguments -pthread -stdlib=libc++ -arch arm64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX11.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/a.out.dir/main.cpp.o -o a.out   -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/root/6.24.04_1/lib/root  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/root/6.24.04_1/lib/root -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib/root lib/librefer.a /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libPhysics.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libPostscript.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libROOTDataFrame.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libROOTNTuple.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libROOTVecOps.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libRint.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libTreePlayer.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libGraf3d.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libGpad.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libGraf.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libHist.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libMatrix.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libTree.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libMathCore.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libImt.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libMultiProc.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libNet.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libRIO.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libThread.so /opt/homebrew/lib/root/libCore.so
